AutomatedActionOverride.name: AutomatedActionOverride
AutomatedActionOverride.description: Represents a modified attribute of a shared automated action. For example, the modified attribute can contain customizations for your business.

FieldName.description: The name of the field to override.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the automated action override record is locked or not.

IsRelatedRecordOverridable.description: Indicates whether the parent automated action record can be overridden.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the automated action override record can be edited or not.

RelatedRecordApiName.description: The object name of the RelatedRecordId.

Value.description: The overridden value used for FieldName.
